question: Which of the following were the participants of the "Battle of the Sexes III" tennis match?
option2: Billie Jean King Vs Bobby Riggs
explanation: Martina Navratilova and Jimmy Connors were the participants of the "Battle of the Sexes III" tennis match in September 1992. In tennis, "Battle of the Sexes" describes various exhibition matches played between a man and a woman, or a doubles match between two men and two women in one case.
